title: Community Subscription Fees Recoup
description: Some expenses this past year have been covered by individual members of the community. Discord, Zoom, Miro all have costs associated.
solution: The community adoption has shown these venues and tools represent great onboarding value, let's pay back the expenses to the pioneers.
experience: **Early creators** (who bore the expense of the tools) to create the spaces for Community to gather, discuss, & learn about Catalyst.
